title: 'Worth buying!!'
body: 'I purchased the maroon ethnic skirt for my wife. It is so beautiful. Value for money. The fabric gives it a rich look. It can be worn with a crop top or a blouse like lehenga. I am happy with the purchase. My wife is 5\'2" so it\'s bit long for her even with 2.5 inch heel. It can fit upto 38" waist comfortably.'

title: 'Worth every penny spend'
body: 'Extremely beautiful and exactly as shown... Bright pink colour as expected...worth spending money...the flare is also good ..my height is 5.7 and cums until the floor length...has a zip on the side and elastic at the back...super happy..highly recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è'

title: 'Mismatch'
